javax.security.identitystore.persistence

Class LdapIdentityStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.security.identitystore.persistence.AbstractIdentityStore
      • javax.security.identitystore.persistence.LdapIdentityStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IdentityStore

    @Alternative
public class LdapIdentityStore
extends AbstractIdentityStore
    LdapIdentityStore is an IdentityStore implementation which uses an external LDAP server as a persistence mechanism.

      LdapIdentityStore(Hashtable<String,Object> contextEnvironment, LdapEntryMapping entryMapping)

      • getCallerGroups

        public List<String> getCallerGroups(String callerName)
        Determines the list of groups that the specified Caller is in, based on the associated persistence store.
        Parameters:
        callerName - The Caller name
        Returns:
        The list of groups that the specified Caller is in, empty list if none, null if not supported.

      • getCallerRoles

        public List<String> getCallerRoles(String callerName)
        Determines the list of roles that the specified Caller has, based on the associated persistence store. The returned role list would include roles directly assigned to the Caller, and roles assigned to groups which contain the Caller.
        Parameters:
        callerName - The Caller name
        Returns:
        The list of roles that the specified Caller has, empty list if none, null if not supported.
